author: wn.com
title: Hunger & Food Security in Africa, ‘Food Security’ Bill Focus of House Hearing (Chris Smith) ...
text: ( Source : Chris Smith ) The challenge of food security and nutrition in sub-Saharan Africa was the focus of a congressional hearing October 7 held by U.S. Rep. Chris Smith ( NJ-04 ), chairman of the House Africa and global health subcommittee.
